          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mártírnők menete, 6. század, Ravenna, San Apollinare Nuovo, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Marching of the martyr women, 6th century, San Apollinare Nuovo, mosaic</string>

San Apollinare Nuovo, mosaico</string>
